author: jleroux
msg: I had a look at type="Double" in *SimpleMethods*.xml, *events*.xml, *formula*.xml, *services*.xml, *tests*.xml files and I found only this one (about currency) to be changed to BigDecimal. I think others occurrences are ok since they deal about rate or quantity. Else it's not a big deal to change them, so please (Scott, David?) let me know, thanks

author: rjung

Change SSL.randSet() javadoc to the tcnative one.
Add Socket.sendib() and Socket.sendibb from tcnative.
All renames methods and method signature changes
are compatible, because those methods are not used
Changes of return types are compatible, because
the return values have not been used.
